$interpreted: Theodore: C-Could it be...Rayzor's core was never here in the first place?
Sherlock: The Rayzor's mechanical parts are all extremely delicate and sensitive! You removed it, hastily put it back, and fired that massive blast...
Sherlock: ...the core has suffered a meltdown and was already damaged beyond repair!
Theodore: If that's the case, then why did you...
Angelia: The Rayzor is the only thing that can threaten uncle's position. Since we already predicted that you'd distrust the nobles,
Angelia: It wasn't difficult to conclude that you would send your personal army to seize the Rayzor. There's no way I would miss such an opportunity.
Theodore: Hence you set up this entire scenario, and you even went as far as letting that lady hide in the chariot to ambush me?
Theodore: Angelia, it has just been a few months since we last saw each other, yet you're already as cunning as I am.
Theodore: It seems that I was indeed too protective of you in the past.
Angelia: Uncle, this is it. There's nothing left you can do. Please surrender. Considering what you did for me before, I will spare your life...
Theodore: Then lock me in the dungeon until the day I die? King Theodore's life shall not end like that.
Theodore: Angelia, allow your uncle to teach you one final lesson!
Sherlock: A rune bomb!? Don't let him trigger it! If he does, we can all kiss this world goodbye!
Naya: Theodore, put it down!
Angelia: Uncle, don't do this.
Theodore: Forgive me, my queen, but I refuse. Before I detonate this thing, you people still have time to escape.
Angelia: NOOOO!!
Theodore: William...may you bless your daughter from beyond the skies...
Theodore: Shirley...will you come and see me after this...?
Angelia: How is that...possible...?
Yamitsuki: The Feather Clan!?
Dagger: Ehhhhhh!? Someone care to explain what's going on now?
Elio: I'm sorry. I-I can't just stay back and watch my father die like this...
Angelia: Father? So you're the rumored illegitimate son of my uncle?
Naya: Theodore's illegitimate son is a member of the Feather Clan!? Doesn't this mean that his other half is a demihuman...
Yamitsuki: "The wings of the Half-Blood, shall swipe away the imposter blocking the Sun"...
Yamitsuki: When did your powers awaken?
Elio: Not too long ago. The moment I awakened, I learned the truth of my birth...for the longest time, I thought I was an orphan.
Elio: All of sudden, I learned that I still have two relatives. On top of that, they are enemies of each other...I was so conflicted...
Angelia: So that's why you insisted on accompanying me?
Elio: I want to understand what kind of person my cousin is. I also wanted to hear from you directly what kind of person my father is...
Elio: Princess, you told me that "There is no absolute answer to this. You should decide for yourself."
Elio: Just now, I heard father call mother's name...I got the feeling...that my father is not an evil man...
Naya: Regardless, put Theodore down first, then we can talk!
Elio: Princess, my father no longer poses a threat to you. Please, let him go.
Angelia: That I cannot do. Locking him up is already my biggest compromise. If I let him go, he will threaten the kingdom again one day!
Elio: If that's how it's going to be...
Elio: Forgive me, my queen, but I refuse!
Naya: Angel, on your command!
Dagger: Hey, isn't that a bit too much? He is still your relative after all!
Naya: Angel!?
Angelia: Forget about it, Elio has a point. Theodore no longer poses a threat. Let him go.
Angelia: Sir Dagger, what is the current situation?
Dagger: Theodore's forces have all surrendered. Could say that it's decisive victory for us!
Angelia: The civil war has finally come to an end...
Angelia: So why don't I feel at peace...

Model.Text: C-Could it be...Rayzor's core was never here in the first place?
The Rayzor's mechanical parts are all extremely delicate and sensitive! You removed it, hastily put it back, and fired that massive blast...
...the core has suffered a meltdown and was already damaged beyond repair!
If that's the case, then why did you...
The Rayzor is the only thing that can threaten uncle's position. Since we already predicted that you'd distrust the nobles,
It wasn't difficult to conclude that you would send your personal army to seize the Rayzor. There's no way I would miss such an opportunity.
Hence you set up this entire scenario, and you even went as far as letting that lady hide in the chariot to ambush me?
Angelia, it has just been a few months since we last saw each other, yet you're already as cunning as I am.
It seems that I was indeed too protective of you in the past.
Uncle, this is it. There's nothing left you can do. Please surrender. Considering what you did for me before, I will spare your life...
Then lock me in the dungeon until the day I die? King Theodore's life shall not end like that.
Angelia, allow your uncle to teach you one final lesson!
A rune bomb!? Don't let him trigger it! If he does, we can all kiss this world goodbye!
Theodore, put it down!
Uncle, don't do this.
Forgive me, my queen, but I refuse. Before I detonate this thing, you people still have time to escape.
NOOOO!!
William...may you bless your daughter from beyond the skies...
Shirley...will you come and see me after this...?
How is that...possible...?
The Feather Clan!?
Ehhhhhh!? Someone care to explain what's going on now?
I'm sorry. I-I can't just stay back and watch my father die like this...
Father? So you're the rumored illegitimate son of my uncle?
Theodore's illegitimate son is a member of the Feather Clan!? Doesn't this mean that his other half is a demihuman...
"The wings of the Half-Blood, shall swipe away the imposter blocking the Sun"...
When did your powers awaken?
Not too long ago. The moment I awakened, I learned the truth of my birth...for the longest time, I thought I was an orphan.
All of sudden, I learned that I still have two relatives. On top of that, they are enemies of each other...I was so conflicted...
So that's why you insisted on accompanying me?
I want to understand what kind of person my cousin is. I also wanted to hear from you directly what kind of person my father is...
Princess, you told me that "There is no absolute answer to this. You should decide for yourself."
Just now, I heard father call mother's name...I got the feeling...that my father is not an evil man...
Regardless, put Theodore down first, then we can talk!
Princess, my father no longer poses a threat to you. Please, let him go.
That I cannot do. Locking him up is already my biggest compromise. If I let him go, he will threaten the kingdom again one day!
If that's how it's going to be...
Forgive me, my queen, but I refuse!
Angel, on your command!
Hey, isn't that a bit too much? He is still your relative after all!
Angel!?
Forget about it, Elio has a point. Theodore no longer poses a threat. Let him go.
Sir Dagger, what is the current situation?
Theodore's forces have all surrendered. Could say that it's decisive victory for us!
The civil war has finally come to an end...
So why don't I feel at peace...
